items.content_html: SQLiteKV is a lightweight key-value store built on top of SQLite3, offering basic key-value operations with support for expiry times, JSON export, and flexible storage options including in-memory, temporary, and disk-based storage. Ideal for applications requiring persistent and reliable storage.
items.title: dev-rio/SQLiteKV: SQLiteKV is a lightweight key-value store built on top of SQLite3, offering basic key-value operations with support for expiry times, JSON export, and flexible storage options including in-memory, temporary, and disk-based storage. Ideal for applications requiring persistent and reliable storage.
